resources.string: THIS APP DOES NOT PROMOTE BUNKING. THE APP WAS DESIGNED TO ENSURE THAT YOU CAN MANAGE A PROPER ATTENDANCE AND BUNK SAFELY.THE ATTENDANCE SHOWN IS COMPLETELY MANAGED BY COLLEGE.THE DEVELOPER IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR INACCURATE ATTENDANCE OR DELAY IN ATTENDANCE UPDATE.
HEY FELLAS! THIS IS MOHIT AGARWAL.\nHOPE YOU ENJOY THE APP.\nREACH ME FOR A COFFEE AT
